page.title: 03BUCKFAST ABBEY
page.content: {Buckfast Abbey}is one of the main tourist attractions in Devon,and thousands of people visit it every year.Inside there is a smell of incense which is a very peaceful smell.There are lots of stone pillars in the{Abbey}and we found out that four people could fit around one pillar.Some parts of the ceiling are bricks supported by stone.The nicest part of the ceiling is where there is a painted picture of faces with Latin words beside them.In the newest chapel there is an enormous stained glass window in the shape of God holding up some communion bread.We thought it looked very bright and colourful.The statues are very detailed and we had to find and name five .They were {Jesus,St.Peter,Anskar vonier,The {Virgin Mary and four angels.}The statues were made of stone,bronze and
